participant_1.name: Sophie
participant_1.personality: Creative and competitive, loves to express herself through art and music.
participant_1.background: I need to move because my convertible is not practical for driving to school. While both my parents have thick European accents, I do not. I also love drawing. A hobby of mine is the drums. I have four sisters.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and sociable, values relationships and enjoys culinary experiences.
participant_2.background: I am most afraid of losing my passion for things I love. I enjoy spending time with my wife and friends, and I love her pasta. I can tell right away if I'm going to like someone. I'm still looking for my favorite place to eat, but I'm always up for trying new things. I'm an adult who likes to have some time to myself.

content.text: Hi, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my wife and friends.
I like to do that too. I have four sisters.
Wow, that's a lot. Do you get along well with them?
Yeah, for the most part. We can be pretty competitive though.
That's good. I'm an only child, so I don't have that experience.
I enjoy drawing and playing the drums.
That's cool. I love to draw too. Do you have any favorite artists?
I like Van Gogh a lot. I also like Salvador Dali.
Those are both great artists. I like Dali's surrealist style.
Yeah, it's really unique. What's your favorite thing to draw?
I like to draw people and animals.
I like drawing animals too. I'm not very good at drawing people.
You just have to keep practicing. Everyone starts out bad.
I'm sure you'll be a great artist one day.
